actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 so as to limit the power of the Secretary of Transportation to delegate his authority to examine medical qualifications of airmen.

summary.text: States that the Secretary of Transportation, in exercising his authority to determine medical qualifications of airmen under the Federal Aviation Act, shall not delegate any part of his authority to any air carrier employee or person performing medical services for a carrier on a contractural basis. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1355(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 so as to limit the power of the Secretary of Transportation to delegate his authority to examine medical qualifications of airmen.
